document_data.name: Virdin
document_data.mainbody: '''Virdin''' was a small mining town found in [[Bloodstone Barony]].
document_data.Geography: Virdin sat directly west of the [[Bloodstone Mines]] in the northern region of the [[Valley of Bloodstone]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The town took its name from [[Virdin]], the last king of [[Damara]]. Many of the stores found in Virdin supported the miners who preferred to sleep above ground at [[The Snoring Giant]] inn. [[Marko Orothiar]], a master smith, also plied his wares in the town if the coin was right.
